analyzed: bzhi po dang /_gzugs med pa bzhi dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
translated: The nine absorptions are the four concentrations of the form realm, the four formless states, and the absorption of cessation.

original: zhes bya ba snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang / sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang /_rnam par shes pa dang / nam mkha'i rang gi ngo bo zhes zad par bcu dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye🔽mched dang /_/rnam pa brgyad du zhes bya ba ni nang gzugs dang gzugs med
analyzed: zhes bya ba snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang / sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang /_rnam par shes pa dang / nam mkha'i rang gi ngo bo zhes zad par bcu dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /_/rnam pa brgyad du zhes bya ba ni nang gzugs dang gzugs med
translated: The ten totalities are earth, water, fire, wind, blue, yellow, red, white, consciousness, and the nature of space.

original: par 'du shes pa dag gi phyi rol gyi gzugs so sor kun gyi rnam pa rnams su blta
analyzed: par 'du shes pa dag gi phyi rol gyi gzugs so sor kun gyi rnam pa rnams su blta
translated: The eight subjugations are the internal forms and the formless perceptions of the external forms.

original: zhing de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes pa zhes bya ba bzhi dang nang gzugs dang gzugs med par 'du shes shing sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po🔽dag zil gyis mnan nas mthong ngo /_/rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud du son pa'i nyon🔽mongs pa'i dgra'i tshhogs rtsha nas bton pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni nyon mongs pa
analyzed: zhing de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes pa zhes bya ba bzhi dang nang gzugs dang gzugs med par 'du shes shing sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag zil gyis mnan nas mthong ngo /_/rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud du son pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshhogs rtsha nas bton pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni nyon mongs pa
translated: The four overpowering cognitions are as follows: One sees blue, yellow, red, and white forms, overpowering the perception of inner forms and formlessness.🔽The concentration that has expelled the hordes of afflictive enemies that are present in one's own and others' mindstreams is called the concentration of the expulsion of afflictions.🔽The concentration of the vajra-like meditative absorption is so called because it destroys the vajra-like afflictions that are difficult to destroy.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par 'grel pa'i bshad sbyar zhes bya ba/
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnam par 'grel pa'i bshad sbyar zhes bya ba/
translated: The concentration of the sphere of totality is so called because it is the meditative absorption that is the basis for the sphere of totality.🔽The concentration of the sphere of limitless space is so called because it is the meditative absorption that is the basis for the sphere of limitless space.🔽The concentration of the sphere of limitless consciousness is so called because it is the meditative absorption that is the basis for the sphere of limitless consciousness.

original: med pa'o/_/mtshhan ma thams cad kyi tshhogs bcom pas yang dag par bral ba
analyzed: med pa'o/_/mtshhan ma thams cad kyi tshhogs bcom pas yang dag par bral ba
translated: The concentration of the sphere of nothingness is so called because it is the meditative absorption that is the basis for the sphere of nothingness.🔽The concentration of the sphere of neither existence nor nonexistence is so called because it is the meditative absorption that is the basis for the sphere of neither existence nor nonexistence.🔽The concentration of the sphere of the summit of existence is so called because it is the meditative absorption that is the basis for the sphere of the summit of existence.

original: dang the tshhom bsal bar mdzad pa dang /_smon lam yang dag par 'phel ba dang 'khor ba ji srid par mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs su 'jug pa'i smon🔽pas mkhyen pa dang /_mngon shes drug ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'o/_/so sor
analyzed: dang the tshhom bsal bar mdzad pa dang /_smon lam yang dag par 'phel ba dang 'khor ba ji srid par mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs su 'jug pa'i smon🔽pas mkhyen pa dang /_mngon shes drug ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'o/_/so sor
translated: The concentration of the sphere of the cessation of discriminations and feelings is so called because it is the meditative absorption that is the basis for the sphere of the cessation of discriminations and feelings.

original: rig pa ni chos so sor rig pa la sogs pa bzhi'o/_/rten dang dmigs pa dang / sems dang ye shes yongs su dag pa bzhi'o/_/dbang bcu dang ni zhes bya ba ni/
analyzed: rig pa ni chos so sor rig pa la sogs pa bzhi'o/_/rten dang dmigs pa dang / sems dang ye shes yongs su dag pa bzhi'o/_/dbang bcu dang ni zhes bya ba ni/
translated: Awareness is the four kinds of awareness, such as the awareness of phenomena, and so forth.🔽The four purities are the purity of the support, the object, the mind, and gnosis.

original: tshhe dang sems dang yo byad dang nyon mongs pa dang /_las dang /_skye ba dang mos pa dang /_smon lam dang rnam par shes pa dang chos so/_/stobs rnams
analyzed: tshhe dang sems dang yo byad dang nyon mongs pa dang /_las dang /_skye ba dang mos pa dang /_smon lam dang rnam par shes pa dang chos so/_/stobs rnams
translated: The ten powers are the power of knowing what is correct and what is incorrect, the power of knowing the ripening of karma, the power of knowing the various aspirations, the power of knowing the various temperaments, the power of knowing the various dhātus, the power of knowing the higher and lower faculties, the power of knowing the path that leads everywhere, the power of knowing the meditative absorptions, liberations, samādhis, and samāpattis, the power of knowing one’s own past lives, the power of knowing the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings, the power of knowing the exhaustion of defilements.

original: dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams ni rab tu grags so/_/yongs su dag pa ni sku
analyzed: dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams ni rab tu grags so/_/yongs su dag pa ni sku
translated: The four fearlessnesses are the fearlessness of perfect enlightenment, the fearlessness of the exhaustion of defilements, the fearlessness of teaching the obstacles, and the fearlessness of teaching the path of definite deliverance.

original: dang gsung dang thugs bsdus nas spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa🔽ma yin pa dang /_yod par phyin ci ma log par bsdus nas spyod pas pha rol

translated: The four correct and discerning awarenesses are the correct and discerning awareness of phenomena, the correct and discerning awareness of the meaning, the correct and discerning awareness of expression, and the correct and discerning awareness of confidence.

original: yongs su shes pas de sgribs pas de mi mthong bas srung du med pa'o/_/chos
analyzed: yongs su shes pas de sgribs pas de mi mthong bas srung du med pa'o/_/chos
translated: The great compassion is the great compassion that is the nonobservation of phenomena.
